sense.def:
To comment on something
pomeni povedati svoje mnenje o nečem.

seg.quote: Both girls commented on Chris's size.
Someone commented that Brian changes his mind every day.

sense.def:
A comment
je izjava, ki podaja naše mnenje o nečem.

seg.quote: People in the town started making rude comments.
He was not available for comment yesterday.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
no comment
med intervjujem povemo, da nočemo odgovoriti na vprašanje.

seg.quote: ‘Do you intend to keep them in prison?’—‘No comment.’
